ThingDef.label: replacement spine
ThingDef.description: This simple but advanced device can almost perfectly replace a damaged spine.

ThingDef.label: simple rib replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial rib, and nothing more.

ThingDef.label: replacement radius
ThingDef.description: A replacement for the radius, a bone in the lower arm.

ThingDef.label: neuromuscular framework
ThingDef.description: A set of synthetic muscles and artificial nerves capable of perfectly recreating the function of a healthy torso.
